name: atdd-testscriptor
description: Acceptance Test-Driven Development with Business Central

atddTestScriptor.maxLengthOfDescription.description: Sets the max. length of characters allowed in the Given, When or Then descriptions.

atddTestScriptor.addException.description: Adds an 'Not yet implemented'-Error to the body of the created helper functions.

atddTestScriptor.addInitializeFunction.description: Adds a call to the Initialize-Function to each new scenario.

atddTestScriptor.prefixGiven.description: Adds a prefix to the created helper functions.

atddTestScriptor.prefixGivenHistory.description: List of prefixes you used earlier for given elements, so that procedures with these prefixes are considered while modifying or deleting elements

atddTestScriptor.prefixWhen.description: Adds a prefix to the created helper functions.

atddTestScriptor.prefixWhenHistory.description: List of prefixes you used earlier for when elements, so that procedures with these prefixes are considered while modifying or deleting elements

atddTestScriptor.prefixThen.description: Adds a prefix to the created helper functions.

atddTestScriptor.prefixThenHistory.description: List of prefixes you used earlier for then elements, so that procedures with these prefixes are considered while modifying or deleting elements

atddTestScriptor.testDirectory.description: Defines the relative path to the directory in which new test files are saved.

enumDescriptions: Do not show confirmation message & do not remove helper functions
Do not show confirmation message, but do remove helper functions
atddTestScriptor.removalMode.description: Specifies if you're asked if a helper function should be deleted if it's not used anymore after 1. a removal of a given/when/then, 2. a removal of a scenario, 3. a rename of a given/when/then if a helper function to the new naming already exists and you switch to using that one

atddTestScriptor.showConfirmations.description: Specifies if confirmations will show up on updating/removing elements in general.

scripts.vscode:prepublish: yarn run compile && yarn run dist
